channel.title: Others cannot log into sever but only me using no-ip?
channel.description: ok, so i start the server, and i open up regular client that u can download, i can log in fine with the no-ip.info adress, however my freind tried getting in and it says server must be down for him. Whats wrong?

item.title: Others cannot log into sever but only me using no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @Aurai Aurai
item.description:
@Aurai wrote:

I believe that its the fact you guys are using a router.
If you’re using a router, go to http://www.port-forward.com/ and see if their tutorials can help you.
If not, come back here and I’ll do my best.

Read full topic
item.source: Others cannot log into sever but only me using no-ip?

item.title: Others cannot log into sever but only me using no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Port forward, open the port through your firewall, No-ip DUC running?

Read full topic
